results.question: Which lyric is about Red Hot Chili Peppers frontman Anthony Kiedis?
results.correct_answer: "A rainy Lithuanian / Is dancing as an Indian"
incorrect_answers: "Fly away on, my zephyr / I feel it more than ever"
"And I liked the dimple in your chin / Your pale blue eyes"
"You used to be so warm and affectionate...but now you're quick to get into your regret"

incorrect_answers: This Song Is Not About A Girl
